full_summary:
***Service Contract Notice***

### Contract Overview

The Government of Canada, through Employment and Social Development, invites qualified proponents to submit a proposal for facilitation services in support of the virtual training program titled "Developing Strong Connections – Building Relationships and Rapport in Call Centres". The expected contract commencement date is January 30, 2024, and the contract will expire on June 21, 2024.

**Migration Details:**

* Tender Reference: cb-282-22344564
* Solicitation Number: 100025162
* Original Publication Date: January 15, 2024
* Tender Closing Date and Time: January 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time

### Description of Service

The successful proponent will be responsible for providing facilitation services for the virtual training program, designing and delivering an estimated minimum of 145 training sessions, with a maximum of 170 sessions, over a period of approximately six months. The program will be conducted in both English and French, targeting approximately 5,000 employees.

### Solicitation Procedure

This procurement is subject to the Long-Term Agreement (LTEA) and will be conducted as a selective tendering process.

### Trade Agreements and Preferences

This solicitation is covered under the following international trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Accessibility

The Government of Canada is committed to accessibility and invites persons with disabilities to participate in the solicitation process.
